title: Updates
content:
Adds minor changes and fixes.
- Your selected taskbar color stays selected after re-opening System settings.
- System settings app redesigned.
- Improved window design and handling.

title: Status update
content:
We've been in the prototype phase for about two years. In that time, I've tried a few things and now I think I have an idea about the direction this project should head in.

The ultimate goal is to provide an environment that would be adjustable and extensible. This ultimately leads to the modding implementation. After the main set of features is at least somewhat polished, modding will be implemented, after which, it's in the hands of the community to dictate the direction of development.

title: Homepage redesign
content: Redesigned the whole homepage look and feel to fit the game's themes.

title: Add Changelog
content: This update added a live changelog feed to the homepage.
